attributes.action: Make the wearing of face masks outside by people over 5, compulsory
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to do this because there is often a flagrant breach of social distancing by people and with the COVID 19 virus now more transmittable there is an urgent need for all people to wear masks to help stop the spread of the virus to each other.
attributes.background: To pass into law the mandatory requirement to wear a face mask outside subject as stated above
